data.title: Delicious Sandwiches
data.text: Hungry and unsure of what we wanted, my husband and I walked into Jimmy Johns. After surveying the various sandwiches available, I chose a turkey club on whole wheat bread. Delicious!  What a great sandwich!  Filling and satisfying, I will be sure to have it again.

data.title: Unlike other Jimmy Johns
data.text: I frequently order 'unwich' sandwiches at multiple Jimmy Johns locations when I travel for work. I have stopped at the Council Bluffs location twice and both times have gotten lettuce on my 'unwich' that does not look the least bit appetizing. I understand it probably does not pose a health risk but will skip this location in future.

data.title: Delicious
data.text: They advertise free smells and the food matches. It's mouth watering delicious and this location is quick and clean. A great stop.
